brainly_data.question:
Is this a rhetorical question?

“How could you have a slogan like ‘freedom is slavery’ when the concept of freedom has been abolished?”
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
Is this a rhetorical question?

“How could you have a slogan like ‘freedom is slavery’ when the concept of freedom has been abolished?”
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Yes this would be considered a rhetorical question because they are asking this question to make a point rather than to receive an answer
